title: Optimize animation rendering performance
description: Current implementation spawns syscgo process for each frame which is extremely inefficient. Need to use sysc-Go library directly. Challenge: sysc-Go animations use mixed APIs - some take (width, height, palette), others use Config structs (Aquarium, Beams, BeamText, Decrypt, Pour, Print). Solution: Create wrapper layer that handles both API styles and maintains state between frames. This will eliminate process spawning overhead and dramatically improve performance.
